## Conversation that answers the provided questions:
**User:**
Hi! I'm trying to prepare my Verus Mobile wallet to receive some ERC-20s on Verus. Do you know how I can do that?

**AI Assistant:**
To prepare your Verus Mobile wallet to receive USDC, EURC, or DAI (as ERC-20s), you need to add the currencies on the Verus blockchain to your wallet. This can be done by pressing the plus-button in the bottom-right corner, then pressing "Add PBaaS currency", filling in the currency name (e.g. eurc.veth, vusdc.veth or dai.veth), and pressing "ADD". Have you tried that already?

**User:**
That was really helpful, thanks! Now I want to bridge some EURC from Ethereum to Verus using Verus Mobile. Can you walk me through that process?

**AI Assistant:**
To bridge EURC (or other ERC-20s) from Ethereum to Verus using Verus Mobile, you need to select the ERC-20 you want to bridge, press "Send" and then "Convert or cross-chain", press "Send off-chain", fill in the recipient address (a Verus address you own), the amount you want to bridge, select "Verus" as the network to send to, and choose the currency to receive as (e.g. EURC.vETH). Do you have any questions about that process?

**User:**
I think I understand that, but I'd also like to know how to bridge EURC from Ethereum to Verus using MetaMask and the Verus-Ethereum Bridge website.

**AI Assistant:**
To bridge EURC (or other ERC-20s) from Ethereum to Verus using MetaMask and the Verus-Ethereum Bridge website, you need to connect MetaMask with the website, fill in the address where you want the funds to end up on the Verus blockchain, select the token you want to bridge (e.g. EURC.vETH), select the destination (the same address on VRSC), choose the amount you want to bridge, and then wait for up to 90 minutes for the funds to arrive on Verus. Have you used MetaMask before?

**User:**
I've heard that Switch is fully launched now. Can you tell me how I can convert between VRSC, DAI.vETH, vUSDC.vETH, and EURC.vETH?

**AI Assistant:**
With Switch fully launched, you can convert between VRSC, DAI.vETH, vUSDC.vETH, and EURC.vETH using an Automated Market Maker (AMM) on Verus DeFi. This can be done using Verus Desktop or Verus Mobile. It's a convenient way to switch between these currencies. Do you have any other questions about Switch or Verus DeFi?
How can I prepare my Verus Mobile wallet to receive USDC, EURC, or DAI (as ERC-20s) on Verus?

To prepare your Verus Mobile wallet to receive USDC, EURC, or DAI (as ERC-20s), you need to add the currencies on the Verus blockchain to your wallet. This can be done by pressing the plus-button in the bottom-right corner, then pressing "Add PBaaS currency", filling in the currency name (e.g. eurc.veth, vusdc.veth or dai.veth), and pressing "ADD".

ontinue.
Press OK when a warning screen pops up.
Now you are ready to receive USDC, EURC or DAI (as ERC-20s) on Verus Mobile.
Before bridging the tokens over to Verus let’s add the currencies on the Verus blockchain to the wallet:
Adding the currencies on the Verus blockchain on Verus Mobile.
Press the plus-button bottom-right corner.
Press “Add PBaaS currency”.
Fill in eurc.veth, vusdc.veth or dai.veth and press continue.
Press “ADD”.
Now we are ready to bridge the ERC-20s over to the Verus blockchain.
Bridging EURC to Verus. It will come out as EURC.vETH.
Select the ERC-20 you want to bridge. (In the example we use EURC).
Press “Send” and then “Convert or cross-chain”.
Press “Send off-chain”.
As the recipient address fill in a Verus address you own (R- or i-address, or VerusID).
Fill in the amount you want to bridge over.
Then as “Select network to send to” choose Verus
Then as “Select currency to receive as” choose EURC.vETH
That’s it. It can take up to 90 minutes before the ERC-20 arrives as a currency on Verus.
Bridging with MetaMask
Let’s bridge with MetaMask and the Verus-Ethereum Bridge website:
Bridging with MetaMask to a Verus-address, EURC used as example.
Connect MetaMask with this website: https://eth.verusbridge.io/
Address: where you want the DAI, USDC or EURC to end up on the Verus blockchain (as DAI.vETH, vUSDC.vETH or EURC.vETH)
Select token: [Euro Coin] as EURC.vETH, [0xa0b86991c6218b36c1d19d4a2e9eb0ce3606eb48] as vUSDC.vETH or DAI.vETH
Destination: select the same … on VRSC
Choose the amount you want to bridge over
It may take up to 90 minutes before the funds arrive on Verus
Convert DAI, USDC, EURC & VRSC with each other
Now that Switch is fully launched you can convert between VRSC, DAI.vETH, vUSDC.vETH and EURC.vETH. It’s now an AMM. Learn more on Verus DeFi here.
Convert with Verus Desktop or Verus Mobile.
Convert with Verus Desktop
